cutscenes.intro.text.1:
WE WERE SENT BY THE
POPE INTO THE LANDS
OF LANGOBARDIA 
HORRIBILIS. OUR
MISSION WAS TO FIND
THE HOLY LANCE...
cutscenes.intro.text.2:
WE FINALLY ARRIVED
TO THE WATERS OF
TREBIA RIVER,
CLOSE TO SANCTI
COLUMBANI CHURCH...
cutscenes.intro.text.3:
HOWEVER, THE RIVER
FLOODED THE LANDS,
AND OUR GROUP WAS
CAUGHT BY THE FORCES
OF DARKNESS...
cutscenes.intro.text.4:
I AM ALONE,BUT I
WILL FIND THE
WAY TO THE CHURCH.
GOD, LOOK UPON ME.
cutscenes.endgame.text.1:
I LOOK UPON THE
GATE THAT HAS
APPEARED BEFORE ME.
A COLD AND DARK
GASH IN REALITY...
cutscenes.endgame.text.2:
SURROUNDED ONLY
BY DEAD FLESH,
I DECIDE TO MAKE A
STEP TOWARDS
THE BLACK GATE...
cutscenes.endgame.text.3:
PAIN AND BLACKNESS
ARE THE ONLY THINGS
THAT I FIND INSIDE.
THIS HUNGRY HELL IS
DEVOURING ME...
cutscenes.endgame.text.4:
WHILE MY EYES CLOSE
AND MY FLESH BURNS,
I SEE A DISTANT LIGHT.
GOD, WHY HAST THOU
FORSAKEN ME?

cutscenes.story.text.1:
ITALY, 739 A.D.
THE WAR BETWEEN
BYZANTINES AND
LOMBARDS IS
STILL RAGING.
LIUTPRAND, KING
OF THE LOMBARDS,
IS FIGHTING A
REBEL DUKE IN SOUTH
ITALY, HOPING THAT
THIS WILL UNIFY
HIS REIGN...
cutscenes.story.text.2:
WHILE THE BYZANTINE
EMPIRE IS DEFENDING
ITS LANDS, A GATE
OPENS IN THE
SKIES OF PAPIA,
THE CAPITAL CITY OF
LANGOBARDIA MAIOR.
FROM THIS PORTAL,
NAMED 'VOMITORIUM',
DARK CREATURES
INVADE OUR WORLD...
cutscenes.story.text.3:
LANGOBARDIA MAIOR
LANDS ARE LOST.
THE VICTIMS ARE
UNCOUNTABLE. POPE
ZACCARIA, LEADER OF
THE CHURCH, STOPS
THE MONSTERS IN THE
LOST LANDS WITH
THE BYZANTINES HELP.
ORCUS, GOD'S ENEMY,
HAS COMETH...
cutscenes.story.text.4:
ITALY, 750 A.D.
LIUTPRAND IS DEAD.
BYZANTINES AND
LOMBARDS, UNIFIED
BY THE FAITH,
FIGHT TOGETHER A
DESPERATE WAR
AGAINST THE DARK.
THE LOST LANDS
ARE NOW CALLED
LANGOBARDIA
HORRIBILIS...
cutscenes.story.text.5:
KNOWING THAT THE
ONLY WEAPONS ABLE
TO DEFEAT THE
DARKNESS ARE
THE CHRISTIAN HOLY
RELICS, THE POPE
IS REQUESTING
DANGEROUS
MISSIONS IN THE
CURSED LANDS,
IN THE HOPE OF
FINDING OF THEM...
